channel.title: CVE Feed for WPDeveloper -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPDeveloper -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32245|2024-08-02T15:10:24.201Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20pro
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor Pro.This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor Pro: from n/a through 5.4.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-32243|2024-08-02T15:10:24.229Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor allows Privilege Escalation. This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor: from 5.4.0 through 5.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32241|2024-08-02T15:10:24.227Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20pro
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor Pro plugin <= 5.4.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-39649|2024-08-02T13:39:36.351Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 5.9.26.
